amendment.description: Amendment sought to remove the Native Hawaiian Education Act from coverage under the bill.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 1 printed in House Report 105-726 to strike lines 11 through 13 on page 17 that repeal the Native Hawaiian Education Act.

action.text: On agreeing to the Mink amendment (A001) Failed by recorded vote: 200 - 207 (Roll No. 450).
